content: flower hair tie by tricotteavecninie a super simple and easy to make little hair tie cover for any elastic band this pattern is adjustable depending on the diameter of your elastic band yarn weight or hook size skills level beginner easy-peasy supplies needed - crochet hook size e - cotton yarn lion bonbons works really well - hair tie elastic bands for example goody works well - tapestry needle to weave in your ends - scissors stitch abbreviations - chain with single_crochet chain with a single_crochet - double_crochet double_crochet - sl slip - simply bring the yarn all the way through without looping the yarn over - shell 5 double_crochet into the same stitch - skip skip just skip over the next stitch unworked pattern round1 ch45 with single_crochet around the elastic band as demonstrated below make sure to bring the stitches close together as you chain to fully cover the elastic band sl into the first chain to close the loop do not turn round2 ch2 double_crochet in the next stitch and all stitches around after your last double_crochet sl into the top loop of the first double_crochet of the round to close the round this will prevent any gaps for a more uniform look do not turn round3 ch2 dc4 into the same stitch as your ch2 skip next stitch sl into the next one **shell into next stitch sk1 sl into next stitch sk1** repeat the set pattern between ** ** all the way around to complete the flower to finish cut yarn and weave in all your ends this pattern is the property of tricotteavecninie and may not be sold or reproduced
